titles: Newes from Italy of a second Moses or, the life of Galeacius Caracciolus the noble Marquesse of Vico Containing the story of his admirable conuersion from popery, and his forsaking of a rich marquessedome for the Gospels sake. Written first in Italian, thence translated into latin by reuerend Beza, and for the benefit of our people put into English: and now published by W. Crashavv ...
Historia della vita di Galeazzo Caracciolo. English
author: Balbani, Niccolo, d. 1587.
Crashaw, William, 1572-1626.
publisher: Printed by H[enry] B[allard] for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetestreete,
notes: A translation of: Balbani, Niccolo.  Historia della vita di Galeazzo Caracciolo.
Running title reads: The life of Galeacius Caracciolus, Marq. of Vico.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Protestants --  Italy --  Biography --  Early works to 1800.
